Nominee: Samuel W. Bodman, of Massachusetts, to be Secretary of Energy, vice Spencer Abraham, resigned.
actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 109-1. {
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Domenici, Committee on Energy and Natural Resources, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 7. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
Confirmed by the Senate by Voice Vote.
